welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lobito, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante D. Bina
restaurants.description: Restaurante D. Bina is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pastelaria Auria
restaurants.description: Pastelaria Auria is a breakfast spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: Jango Terminus
restaurants.description: Jango Terminus is a sandwich spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: Mi Luis Sabores
restaurants.description: Mi Luis Sabores is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Catumbela Airport is a modern and spacious building, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Catumbela Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle all types of cargo, including perishable goods and oversized freight.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a strong and stable connection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen V Deslandes Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gen V Deslandes Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
